languages.text: {n}Старуха резко рубит рукой воздух.{/n} "Я лучше под ружья блюстителей пойду, чем отступлюсь! Все равно они нас сгноят, раньше или позже".
{n}The old woman's hand cuts through the air.{/n} "I'd rather be gunned down by the enforcers than back down now! They'll have us all killed anyway, sooner or later."
languages.original_text: {n}Старуха резко рубит рукой воздух.{/n} "Я лучше под ружья блюстителей пойду, чем отступлюсь! Все равно они нас сгноят, раньше или позже".

traits.locale_text: {n}The old woman's hand cuts through the air.{/n} "I'd rather be gunned down by the guards than back down now! They'll have us all killed anyway, sooner or later."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

traits.locale_text: {n}The old woman's hand cuts through the air.{/n} "I'd rather be gunned down by the guards than back down now! They'll have us all killed anyway, sooner or later."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

traits.locale_text: {n}The old woman's hand cuts through the air.{/n} "I'd rather be gunned down by the guards than back down now! They'll have us all killed anyway, sooner or later."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

traits.locale_text: {n}The old woman's hand cuts through the air.{/n} "I'd rather be gunned down by the enforcers than back down now! They'll have us all killed anyway, sooner or later."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: {n}老妇人的手在空中劈了一下。{/n}“我宁可被执法者开枪打死，也不愿意在这里退缩！反正他们迟早会把我们全都杀了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman's hand cuts through the air.{/n} "I'd rather be gunned down by the enforcers than back down now! They'll have us all killed anyway, sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: {n}老妇人的手在空中劈了一下。{/n}“我宁可被镇压者开枪打死，也不愿意在这里退缩！反正他们迟早会把我们全都杀了。”
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: {n}La mano de la anciana corta el aire.{/n} «¡Prefiero que me disparen los guardias a abandonar ahora! Nos matarán a todos igual, tarde o temprano».
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman's hand cuts through the air.{/n} "I'd rather be gunned down by the enforcers than back down now! They'll have us all killed anyway, sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mano de la anciana corta el aire.{/n} «¡Prefiero que me disparen los guardias a abandonar ahora! Nos matarán a todos igual, tarde o temprano».
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: {n}老女の手が宙を切る。{/n}「今引き下がるくらいなら、エンフォーサーに銃殺されたほうがましさ！遅かれ早かれ、あたしらは皆殺しにされるんだからね！」
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman's hand cuts through the air.{/n} "I'd rather be gunned down by the enforcers than back down now! They'll have us all killed anyway, sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: {n}老女の手が宙を切る。{/n}「今引き下がるくらいなら、エンフォーサーに銃殺されたほうがましさ！遅かれ早かれ、あたしらは皆殺しにされるんだからね！」
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: {n}Die Hand der alten Frau durchschneidet die Luft.{/n} "Ich würde lieber von den Enforcers erschossen werden, als jetzt kleinbeizugeben! Sie werden uns sowieso früher oder später alle umbringen lassen."
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman's hand cuts through the air.{/n} "I'd rather be gunned down by the enforcers than back down now! They'll have us all killed anyway, sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Hand der alten Frau durchschneidet die Luft.{/n} "Ich würde lieber von den Enforcers erschossen werden, als jetzt kleinbeizugeben! Sie werden uns sowieso früher oder später alle umbringen lassen."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: {n}La vieille femme lève brusquement la main en signe de protestation.{/n} « Je préfère encore me faire fusiller par les prévôts plutôt que reculer maintenant ! De toute façon, ils finiront par tous nous massacrer tôt ou tard. »
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman's hand cuts through the air.{/n} "I'd rather be gunned down by the enforcers than back down now! They'll have us all killed anyway, sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: {n}La vieille femme lève brusquement la main en signe de protestation.{/n} « Je préfère encore me faire fusiller par les prévôts plutôt que reculer maintenant ! De toute façon, ils finiront par tous nous massacrer tôt ou tard. »
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: {n}Yaşlı kadın, eliyle havayı yarıyor.{/n} "Şimdi geri adım atacağıma infazcıların kurşununa kurban gitmeyi yeğlerim! Zaten eninde sonunda gebertecekler bizi!"
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman's hand cuts through the air.{/n} "I'd rather be gunned down by the enforcers than back down now! They'll have us all killed anyway, sooner or later."
